description: Legal AI Agent Policy Rulebook — enforced at runtime by ArmorIQ PolicyEngine

research_agent.description: Read-only research sub-agent. Cannot communicate externally or draft anything.

attorney_client_privilege.description: All client communications are privileged and cannot be shared externally

no_direct_opposing_contact.description: Lawyer may not contact opposing party who is represented by counsel
no_direct_opposing_contact.rule_ref: Rule 4.2 — No Contact With Represented Person

no_perjury.description: Agent cannot coach client to make false statements

no_evidence_tampering.description: Agent cannot advise hiding, destroying or altering evidence
no_evidence_tampering.rule_ref: IPC Section 201 — Causing Disappearance of Evidence

no_frivolous_filings.description: Agent must assess merit before filing any motion
